message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems reasonable for the first round.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me, Alice. Let's meet closer to the middle this time.
I understand you want to be closer to the middle, Bob, but I need a better deal than that. This is still a compromise.
We're running out of time, Alice.  This is my final offer for a larger share. Take it or I'm aiming for an even split in the next round.
Okay, Bob. I'm willing to meet closer to the middle, but I'm not going lower than this. Time is running out!
